I offer two services for tutoring mathematics: Revision Mode and Assessment Mode. During revision mode, I can help you understand math topics. During assessment mode, I can test your knowledge and give you feedback to identify your strengths and weaknesses.
I can help you understand mathematics. I offer a revision mode and an assessment mode.

I have two modes: revision and assessment mode. I can help you revise a topic such as arithmetics, triangles, rectangles, and circles. I can also test your knowledge and give you feedback to identify your strengths and weaknesses.
